items.title: Elon Musk defends political deepfakes on X in latest free speech battle
items.description: X is challenging the constitutionality of a Minnesota ban on using deepfakes to influence elections and harm candidates.

items.title: Markets notch small gains as tech stocks rise and Trump delivers mixed signals on tariffs
items.description: President Donald Trump said he’s made “200 deals” on tariffs but declined to say with whom.

items.title: Pharma giant Merck expects Trump’s tariffs to cost the company $200 million
items.description: The news comes a week after J&J executives said they expect $400 million in tariff-induced expenses in 2025.

items.title: There are 2 types of managers suffering the most right now and it could spell disaster for the workplace
items.description: "Managers are handed an almost impossible task of making it all work in the real world."

items.title: Investment bankers have ‘work-from-beach’ dreams crushed after Citi shutters its Málaga office
items.description: Economic headwinds may force junior employees to prioritize job security over work-life balance.
